statements: SELECT * FROM LivestockInspectionReports;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date, livestock_type FROM LivestockInspectionReports;
SELECT report_id, inspector_name, condition_evaluation FROM LivestockInspectionReports WHERE inspection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM LivestockInspectionReports WHERE livestock_type = 'Cow' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, health_assessment FROM LivestockInspectionReports WHERE inspector_name LIKE '%John%' AND condition_evaluation IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM LivestockInspectionReports WHERE inspection_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY inspector_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_id, livestock_type, health_assessment FROM LivestockInspectionReports WHERE health_assessment IS NOT NULL ORDER BY inspection_date ASC;
SELECT inspector_name, COUNT(*) AS inspection_count FROM LivestockInspectionReports GROUP BY inspector_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT livestock_type, COUNT(*) AS type_count FROM LivestockInspectionReports GROUP BY livestock_type ORDER BY type_count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT report_id, inspector_name, health_assessment, condition_evaluation FROM LivestockInspectionReports WHERE inspector_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM Livestock_Inspection_Reports;
SELECT inspector_name, health_assessment FROM Livestock_Inspection_Reports ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT livestock_name, owner_name, species FROM Livestock WHERE weight > 500;
SELECT * FROM Livestock_Inspection_Reports WHERE inspection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT livestock_id, birth_date FROM Livestock ORDER BY birth_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Livestock_Inspection_Reports WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT livestock_name, owner_name, species FROM Livestock ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date, health_assessment FROM Livestock_Inspection_Reports WHERE health_assessment != 'Healthy';
SELECT * FROM Livestock WHERE species = 'Cow' AND weight > 500;
SELECT livestock_name, owner_name, birth_date FROM Livestock WHERE owner_name LIKE '%Smith%' OR owner_name LIKE '%Johnson%';
SELECT * FROM livestock_inspection_reports;
SELECT animal_id, inspector_id, inspection_date FROM livestock_inspection_reports WHERE animal_id = 101;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM inspectors ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT species, age, weight FROM animals WHERE age > 3 ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT inspector_id, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM livestock_inspection_reports GROUP BY inspector_id;
SELECT * FROM livestock_inspection_reports;
SELECT report_id, inspection_date, health_assessment FROM livestock_inspection_reports WHERE condition_evaluation = 'Good';
SELECT inspector_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM inspectors WHERE department = 'Veterinary Services';
SELECT animal_id, species, age, sex, weight FROM animals WHERE age > 5 ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT L.report_id, L.inspection_date, L.health_assessment, I.first_name, I.last_name FROM livestock_inspection_reports AS L JOIN inspectors AS I ON L.inspector_id = I.inspector_id;
SELECT * FROM Inspectors;
SELECT report_id, inspection_date, inspector_name FROM LivestockInspectionReports ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT livestock_id, species, breed, gender FROM Livestock WHERE age > 2;
SELECT inspector_name, specialization FROM Inspectors WHERE specialization = 'Veterinarian';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT * FROM Livestock;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date FROM LivestockInspectionReports ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT name, specialization FROM Inspectors WHERE specialization = 'Veterinarian';
SELECT species, breed, age, gender FROM Livestock WHERE age > 3 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT report_id, inspection_date, compliance_status FROM LivestockInspectionReports INNER JOIN ComplianceRecords ON LivestockInspectionReports.report_id = ComplianceRecords.report_id;
SELECT * FROM inspection_reports ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT animal_name, species, birth_date FROM animals WHERE sex='F';
SELECT inspector_name, contact_number, email FROM inspectors WHERE inspector_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT species_name, scientific_name FROM species WHERE classification='Mammal';
SELECT breed_name, breed_description FROM breeds ORDER BY breed_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inspection_reports ORDER BY inspection_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT animal_id, inspector_name, inspection_date FROM inspection_reports WHERE health_assessment LIKE '%good%' AND condition_evaluation LIKE '%healthy%';
SELECT ir.inspectors_name, ins.contact_number, ins.email FROM inspection_reports ir JOIN inspectors ins ON ir.inspector_name = ins.inspector_name;
SELECT a.animal_name, s.species_name, b.breed_name, b.breed_description FROM animals a JOIN species s ON a.species = s.species_name JOIN breeds b ON a.breed = b.breed_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_inspection_reports, MIN(inspection_date) AS first_inspection_date, MAX(inspection_date) AS last_inspection_date FROM inspection_reports;
